LIVEINHOST - New LIFETIME Offers! All on Performance SSD Storage!

======================================================================================
LIVEINHOST VPS plans include:
- SSDs for excellent disk I/O.
- Security setup during provisioning.
- Full root access.
- Free setup.
- Instant activation - 1 hour.
- Custom Reverse DNS for IPs.


URL - https://www.liveinhost.com/nocp-vps
===========================================================
NOCP 1 VPS - Price = $2/mo
===========================================================
- Disk Space = 30 GB (Pure SSD)
- Bandwidth = 1,000GB
- RAM = 1024MB
- OS = Centos 6.8 (option to change OS)

Pure SSD Storage, choose NOCP 1 - $2/mo 

ORDER NOW https://www.liveinhost.com/cs/cart.php?a=add&pid=17
===========================================================



FAQ:
Q: What port speeds are included with the VPS?
A: 100Mbps port speeds for the VPSs. All nodes have 100mbps or 1gbps ports.




Q: What is your average setup time?
A: We average 1 hour setup time currently.




Q: How long have you been in business?
A: Since 2015.




Q: Do you allow proxy sites?
A: We allow private proxy sites. We do not permit public proxy sites.




Q: Do you make backups of all VPSs?
A: Yes, with Liveinhost Protect we maintain backups. We do, however, always recommend keeping your own backups in addition to ours.




Q: Can you assist transferring our existing data?
A: In most cases we can transfer your existing data from another provider for free.
